news.title: C√≥mo hacer staking de criptomonedas y proteger la red
news.subtitle: Aprenda c√≥mo hacer staking y retirar criptomonedas de proveedores de staking l√≠quido directamente en MetaMask Portfolio.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio le permite participar f√°cilmente en staking, un mecanismo de seguridad fundamental de una red de cadena de bloques de prueba de apuesta. Puede acceder a proveedores de staking l√≠quido examinados directamente a trav√©s de la dapp para disfrutar de una experiencia intuitiva a trav√©s de la funci√≥n ‚ÄúStaking‚Äù.


Staking directo


Con MetaMask Portfolio, puede hacer staking de su ETH con los proveedores de staking l√≠quido Lido y Rocket Pool sin necesidad de salir de la dapp. En lugar de buscar otros sitios web o formas seguras de hacer staking, puede utilizar la interfaz de MetaMask Portfolio en la pesta√±a "Staking" para conectarse directamente con los contratos inteligentes de Lido y Rocket Pool.

Tambi√©n habilitamos recientemente staking en MATIC (actualmente solo disponible para usuarios fuera de los EE. UU.) a trav√©s de Lido y Stader Labs. Recuerde: el staking de MATIC se realiza en la red Ethereum.

Haga staking, retire y realice un seguimiento f√°cilmente


Ya sea que sea nuevo en el mundo del staking o no, MetaMask Portfolio hace que sea f√°cil hacer staking, retirar y ver las recompensas acumuladas en una sola ventana. Nunca tendr√° que abandonar la dapp para comenzar a proteger la red Ethereum y recibir una recompensa a cambio.

C√≥mo hacer staking en MetaMask Portfolio


  1. Conecte su monedero MetaMask a portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Haga clic en "Staking" para comenzar y seleccionar entre ETH o MATIC.
  3. Elija el proveedor de staking que desee.
  4. Ingrese la cantidad de ETH o MATIC que desea poner en staking. Puede alternar entre "mensual" y "anual" para ver las recompensas estimadas por hacer staking con esta cantidad. Cuando est√© listo, seleccione "Revisar" para revisar su staking.
  5. Seleccione "Confirmar" una vez revisada y firme la transacci√≥n en su monedero para aprobar y enviar la transacci√≥n de staking.
  6. Una vez que se complete la transacci√≥n, vea las recompensas acumuladas en la tarjeta de tenencias.

¬°Listo! ü¶ä

Staking, un bien p√∫blico


MetaMask Portfolio le permite participar en un bien p√∫blico descentralizado que ayuda a proteger la red de la cadena de bloques. Puede contribuir directamente a la seguridad y el crecimiento de Ethereum y obtener una recompensa a cambio accediendo a proveedores de staking l√≠quido. Ya sea que elija retirar su staking, usar sus tokens stETH/rETH/stMATIC/MATICX como garant√≠a en DeFi o incluso cambiarlos por otro token, puede hacerlo todo en una sola ventana.

¬øListo para hacer staking? Conozca m√°s en metamask.io/portfolio/

MetaMask Portfolio: rastree y administre todo su Web3

MetaMask Portfolio proporciona una plataforma integral y f√°cil de usar para satisfacer sus necesidades web3 y darle el control. Con el Panel de control, las funciones Comprar, Canjear, Puente y Staking, lo tiene todo. Trabajamos constantemente para mejorar y hacer evolucionar la dapp a trav√©s de actualizaciones importantes. Haga clic aqu√≠ para saber m√°s sobre MetaMask Portfolio y sus funciones.

nodes.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3
nodes.subtitle: No matter who you are or how you use web3, MetaMask allows you to do more safely on the decentralized internet

image.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3 Image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Web3 is catalyzing global change and as a MetaMask user, you're leading the charge. You are a trendsetter, trailblazer, creator, and builder, defining and shaping the culture and the systems that will define the next age of the decentralized internet.

Over the years, we‚Äôve built MetaMask to be a wallet without limits, designed for anyone who wants to do more with their crypto, engage with more dapps, and do it more safely. With MetaMask, there are no dead ends, no corner of web3 you can't explore, no dapp you can't connect with. And thanks to its best-in-class security, infinite extensibility, and powerful aggregation and curation in Portfolio, there's never been a better time for you to do more with MetaMask.

Let‚Äôs explore further.

MetaMask Makes You More Powerful in Web3

MetaMask is your gateway to the decentralized web, offering unmatched connectivity to thousands of dapps across networks and devices. It enables users to self-custody their assets, securely manage their digital authority and confidently sign transactions on the web, on the go or natively in a dapp.

MetaMask also brings the best of web3 to you. Instead of building ‚Äúone size fits all‚Äù tools, we aggregate the best web3 bridges, DEXs, onramp providers and staking protocols so you can choose the best tool for the job and manage your assets, without ever leaving the wallet.

Users can effortlessly buy, sell, swap, send, trade and stake tokens, knowing they‚Äôre getting the best rates from dozens of trusted providers.

Configurability, Privacy, and Extensibility: More Control with MetaMask

MetaMask is also pushing the boundaries of user control, offering unmatched configurability. We didn‚Äôt build a ‚Äútake it or leave it‚Äù wallet, instead shaping MetaMask as a customizable extension of you. MetaMask, allows users to set the terms for how applications can interact with their self-custodied data and digital assets.

Nowhere is this configurability more important than with our privacy features that allow users to control even the most basic functionality of the MetaMask wallet - from RPC configuration and token management to custom security warnings and IP tracking. The default settings built into MetaMask to protect users are all configurable, because there is no one size fits all approach to privacy.


Custom privacy settings.


Extend to any network.


Set your terms.

Configurability is not limited to just what the MetaMask team has built. With MetaMask Snaps, users can tailor their experience, extend MetaMask to new networks and even build their own extensions and customizations, without permission - that's permissionless innovation.

Do Everything in Web3 with More Security with MetaMask

None of this matters if users do not feel secure exploring the frontiers of web3. MetaMask is committed to security and has become the battle-tested wallet trusted by millions of users executing their largest and most sensitive transactions.

We have powered billions of transactions across thousands of networks and scores of dapps, without security incidents caused by MetaMask and offer support to our customers 24/7 to ensure they safely navigate web3.

We are constantly investing in security, striking new partnerships like Blockaid's transaction security, adding new capabilities through the team at Wallet Guard, enabling users to build a modular wallet through Snaps and even building runtime protection through our Lavamoat security kernel. And with an open-source codebase and a transparent approach to privacy, you know exactly what you‚Äôre using with MetaMask.

MetaMask, an Extension of You in Web3 Now and Always

As the momentum of regulatory clarity and mainstream interest spurs innovation in our space, MetaMask will continue to be the powerful, configurable, secure wallet for those building and exploring the frontiers of the decentralized internet.

With powerful aggregators that put the best of tools in crypto at your fingertips and configurable settings that put you in control of your assets, data and digital authority, and a steadfast commitment to security and privacy preservation - MetaMask enables you to do more, safely, in web3.

And we‚Äôre just getting started.

nodes.metaDescription: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3

nodes.title: Introducing estimated balance changes for clear transaction outcomes
nodes.subtitle: With estimated balance changes, MetaMask users will get better insight into their send and receive amounts after submitting transactions.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Our latest update introduces estimated balance changes to make it easier to understand what you‚Äôre about to sign.

Estimated balance changes act as a simulation displayed on the confirmation screen to provide a clear overview of the token values of the transaction you're about to confirm. Following the recent integration of Blockaid security alerts, this feature is part of our ongoing commitment to enhance both the user experience and security for our community.

The feature is on by default in MetaMask Extension and Mobile, enjoy!

Multi-network balance updates


Estimated changes are now available for a wide range of token and NFT transactions across:

  • Ethereum mainnet
  • Arbitrum
  • Avalanche
  • Base
  • Linea
  • OP Mainnet
  • Polygon

Our goal with this update is to present a confirmation screen that is both clear and informative, making it easier for you to understand exactly the transaction you‚Äôre about to confirm.

What you can expect to see in your MetaMask wallet


Previously, MetaMask provided details on transaction fees and the total transaction value but lacked a straightforward way to visualize the specific value changes resulting from a transaction. With this update, you'll see precise estimations of the tokens and values being transferred, enhancing your visibility into the movement of assets in and out of your wallet.


Example of the confirmation screen before and after the introduction of estimated balance changes.

Transaction clarity and user safety


Estimated balance changes prevent unintended transaction outcomes that could happen by accident or malicious activity while promoting confidence and safety when exploring web3. It allows you to confirm the amount of tokens from your transaction, separate from your gas fees, before clicking Confirm. For example, estimated balance changes might help in situations where you're thinking you're minting a NFT but may confirm that you're sending money out but not getting anything in return.

We hope our new estimated balance updates help you more safely and clearly navigate through the exciting opportunities within web3!

nodes.metaDescription: With estimated balance changes, MetaMask users will get better insight into their send and receive amounts after submitting transactions.

nodes.title: MetaMask UI Update: Token Auto-Detection Now Available by Default on Extension
nodes.subtitle: Token auto-detection is now enabled by default for new users on MetaMask Extension.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Token auto-detection automatically suggests tokens on the selected network for every network that Portfolio currently supports, eliminating the need for manual token imports.

üîç For New Users: Whether it‚Äôs your first wallet or you are importing a new account, this feature is enabled by default so you will automatically be able to view all your assets.

‚ùó For Existing Users: Enable this feature if you‚Äôre an existing MetaMask Extension user in your Security and Privacy settings under Token Autodetection. To make it easy for existing users to turn this on, they will see a modal asking to turn this feature on.

üëâ Turning Off the Feature: You can disable this feature anytime in your Security and Privacy settings under Token Autodetection.

You can read more about token auto-detection in our support article.

Begone, manual token imports. Enjoy!

nodes.metaTitle: Token Auto-Detection Now Available by Default on MetaMask
nodes.metaDescription: Token auto-detection is now enabled by default for new users on MetaMask Extension.
